org.judal.storage.table.impl

Class AbstractSingleColumnRecord

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.judal.storage.table.impl.AbstractSingleColumnRecord
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Stored, Record, SingleColumnRecord
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SingleObjectColumnRecord

    public abstract class AbstractSingleColumnRecord
extends java.lang.Object
implements SingleColumnRecord
    Base class for Record implementations that hold only a single column
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Sergio Montoro Ten
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • columns

        public ColumnDef[] columns()
        Description copied from interface: Record

        Columns of the Record as given by a ViewDef, TableDef or FetchGroup.

        records of subclass MapRecord may contain more columns than the ones returned by calling this method in order to accommodate growing column families in column-oriented databases.
        Specified by:
        columns in interface Record
        Returns:
        ColumnDef[]

      • load

        public boolean load(java.lang.Object key)
             throws javax.jdo.JDOException
        Description copied from interface: Stored

        Load value into this Stored using the default key-value data source set at EngineFactory for the thread local or the StorageContext.

        If no value is found with given key then this is not modified.
        Specified by:
        load in interface Stored
        Parameters:
        key - Object
        Returns:
        boolean true if value was found and loaded, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        javax.jdo.JDOException

           throws javax.jdo.JDOException
        Description copied from interface: Stored

        Store the value held by this Stored using the default key-value data source set at EngineFactory for the thread local or the StorageContext.

        A store operation will insert the Stored if it does not exist or update it if already exists.
